Description: Rimozione servizi e bloatware per Windows 11

CMD.Nome: Abilitazione su HDD con molta RAM
CMD.Command: reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management\PrefetchParameters" /v EnablePrefetcher /t REG_DWORD /d 3 /f
CMD.Command1: reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management\PrefetchParameters" /v EnableSuperfetch /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f

CMD.Nome: Disattivazione su SSD con molta RAM
CMD.Command: reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management\PrefetchParameters" /v EnablePrefetcher /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
CMD.Command1: reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management\PrefetchParameters" /v EnableSuperfetch /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f

CMD.Nome: Disattivazione su HDD con poca RAM
CMD.Command: reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management\PrefetchParameters" /v EnablePrefetcher /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
CMD.Command1: reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management\PrefetchParameters" /v EnableSuperfetch /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f

CMD.Nome: Ottimizzazione su SSD con poca RAM
CMD.Command: reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management\PrefetchParameters" /v EnablePrefetcher /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f
CMD.Command1: reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management\PrefetchParameters" /v EnableSuperfetch /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f

CMD.Nome: Verifica e crea la chiave DriverSearching
CMD.Command: reg query "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\DriverSearching" >nul 2>&1 && if errorlevel 1 ( reg add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\DriverSearching" /f )

CMD.Nome: Verifica e crea la chiave Power
CMD.Command: reg query "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Power" >nul 2>&1 && if errorlevel 1 ( reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Power" /f )

CMD.Nome: Verifica e crea la chiave PowerThrottling
CMD.Command: reg query "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Power\PowerThrottling" >nul 2>&1 && if errorlevel 1 ( reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Power\PowerThrottling" /f )

CMD.Nome: Verifica e crea la chiave GameConfigStore
CMD.Command: reg query "HKCU\System\GameConfigStore" >nul 2>&1 && if errorlevel 1 ( reg add "HKCU\System\GameConfigStore" /f )

CMD.Nome: Verifica e crea la chiave Desktop
CMD.Command: reg query "HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop" >nul 2>&1 && if errorlevel 1 ( reg add "HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop" /f )

reg query "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Power\PowerSettings\54533251-82be-4824-96c1-47b60b740d00\943c8cb6-6f93-4227-ad87-e9a3feec08d1" >nul 2>&1 && if errorlevel 1 ( reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Power\PowerSettings\54533251-82be-4824-96c1-47b60b740d00\943c8cb6-6f93-4227-ad87-e9a3feec08d1" /f )

reg query "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Power\PowerSettings\2a737441-1930-4402-8d77-b2bebba308a3\d4e98f31-5ffe-4ce1-be31-1b38b384c009\DefaultPowerSchemeValues\8c5e7fda-e8bf-4a96-9a85-a6e23a8c635c" >nul 2>&1 && if errorlevel 1 ( reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Power\PowerSettings\2a737441-1930-4402-8d77-b2bebba308a3\d4e98f31-5ffe-4ce1-be31-1b38b384c009\DefaultPowerSchemeValues\8c5e7fda-e8bf-4a96-9a85-a6e23a8c635c" /f )
reg add "HKCU\Control Panel\Accessibility\Keyboard Response" /v Flags /t REG_SZ /d 122 /f

CMD.Nome: Nascondi prima esperienza di Microsoft Edge
Nascondi la barra di ricerca nella taskbar

CMD.Command:
sc config wsearch start=auto
sc config DiagTrack start=disabled
sc config dmwappushservice start=disabled
sc config wuauserv start=disabled
sc config Dosvc start=disabled

reg add "HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop" /v "MenuShowDelay" /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
reg add "HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop" /v "SmoothScroll" /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
reg add "HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop" /v "UserPreferencesMask" /t REG_BINARY /d "9000000000000000" /f
reg add "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced" /v TaskbarDa /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f

reg add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\DWM" /v "UseComposition" /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
reg add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\DWM" /v "CompositionPolicy" /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f

CMD.Nome: Aggiungi o modifica le proprietÃ  nei registri
CMD.Command: reg add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\DriverSearching" /v "SearchOrderConfig" /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f && reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Power" /v "HiberbootEnabled" /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f && reg add "HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Power\PowerThrottling" /v "PowerThrottlingOff" /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f
